English: What is this? What's going on here?!
Chinese: 這是什麼！？這到底是怎麼回事！？
German: Was ist hier los? Was soll das?!

English:
Ahahahahahaha!
You little hackers are *really* stupid!
Chinese:
啊哈哈哈哈！
駭客們真是小呆瓜耶！
German:
Hahahahahaha!
Ihr Hackerlein seid ganz schön dumm.

English:
No idea you were being played this whole time.
You just blithely came along for the ride!
Chinese:
被人玩弄於手掌心還渾然不自覺，
謝謝你們大搖大擺地聚集到這種地方♪
Korean:
손바닥 위에서 놀아나고 있는 것도 모르고
이런 곳까지, 태연하게 모여 줘서 고마워♪
German:
Kein Gespür dafür, dass ihr benutzt werdet.
Ihr seid ahnungslos hineingetappt!

English:
I'm going to take your unripe mental energy... and
squeeze and squeeze every last drop, all - for - 
me!
Chinese:
你們那種不成熟又青澀的精神能源……
就由大姊姊我來幫你們擠擠擠，通通擠．光．光★
Korean:
너희들의 미성숙하고 풋내나~는 정신 에너지…
누나가, 쥐어짜고 쥐어짜서 전부 쥐어짜, 줄 게♥
German:
Ich nehme mir eure unreife Mentalenergie ...
und presse noch das letzte bisschen davon aus,
damit ich alles für mich habe!
